Header: Compensation paid for Yaan Oya lands
Content: Compensation was paid for those who lost their lands due to the Yaan Oya project in Anuradhapura under the patronage of Minister P Harrison. Compensation was paid for the lands acquired from Horowpathaana and Wahalkada areas of Anuradhapura for the Yaan Oya project. 95 million rupees was paid for 65 individuals as compensation. 1,800 million rupees has been paid as compensation so far, for those who lost their lands due the Yaan Oya project.
